code:
%% Direct Offers - Job Status Transitions %% Converted from docs/architecture/DIRECT_OFFERS_WORKFLOW_VISUAL.md stateDiagram-v2 [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> direct_offer: Client creates direct offer note right of direct_offer Job created Cleaner assigned Awaiting cleaner response end note direct_offer --> bid_accepted: Cleaner accepts
(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) direct_offer --> declined: Cleaner declines
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) note right of declined END STATE Cleaner unassigned Job becomes private Client can repost end note declined --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] bid_accepted --> confirmed: Client pays
(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) note right of confirmed Cleaner confirmed Payment successful Normal workflow begins end note confirmed --> ready_to_start: 30min before
scheduled time ready_to_start --> in_progress: Cleaner starts job in_progress --> awaiting_review: Cleaner finishes
(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) awaiting_review --> completed: Client submits review note right of completed END STATE Payout triggered Job archived after 48h end note completed --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] direct_offer --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels bid_accepted --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels confirmed --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels ready_to_start --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels in_progress --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels note right of cancelled END STATE Can happen at any stage Refund if payment made end note cancelled --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
